data.title: Home
data.meta_description: Radford University serves the Commonwealth of Virginia and the nation through a wide range of academic, cultural, human service and research programs. Well known for its strong faculty/student bonds, innovative use of technology in the learning environment and vibrant student life on a beautiful 211-acre American classical campus, Radford University offers students many opportunities to get involved and succeed in and out of the classroom.
data.text:
More than 80% of Radford University students receive some form of grant, loan, employment assistance or other type of financial aid. Learn more about how to fund your education.

Radford Welcome Weeks are here and full of exciting activities, events, movies and more! Make plans to attend and get to know Radford University and your fellow Highlanders! Share your welcome weeks experiences on social media with #RadWelcome!
